actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Life Zap [Cast, Touch | Endure]: 5 (d10), healing this Being for the damage dealt Dissipate [Cast, Self (Focus)]: Invisible for the duration.

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Wyrd Ward: Cast Checks Targeting it are Hindered, as are attacks made with Magically-enhanced Weapons. Illuminating: Sheds Light out to 30 feet. Statblocks // Fae Statblocks // Fae 157 157 Bestiary OUTERS Beings who are truly alien to the mortal realm or whose intrinsic nature aligns them with forces of good or evil. Their essence is typically tied to either an aligned plane (such as Hellspawn and negative planes or Divines and positive planes), or they are the eldritch horrors from the incomprehensible beyond.
